page.title: 08Occupations in our Area
page.content: {Fencing } One of the occupations in this area is fencing.This is to keep the deer from the young trees. {Farming Most of the farms in this area are small compact farms with not much machinery and not many crops.In fact most of the farms only have animals. {Forestry Most of the trees in our area are pine.There are some other trees as well such as oak, beech, elm, sycamore, rowan and birch. {Building. Most buildings in our area are small crofts except for a few estate houses such as Edradynate, Derculich, and Findynate. Most of these buildings were built some time ago but many local people were involved in work on these estates and some still are.
